name: Big Castle Gothic Walking Sim
description:
Here the playable scene of my last level design project. It's a big map you can explore, inspired by elden ring style. You will walk across mountain, village, lake, castle, city and more strange and magic location.

It's an immersive adventure if you get ready !

Be careful, this piece is for high render picture and not ready for standard PC, a message at the start will warn you.

Artstation project here : https://www.artstation.com/artwork/2qJlOB
